name: Surface Pro X Signature Keyboard with Slim Pen Bundle
description: Next-level versatility comes in the perfect pair. Surface Slim Pen stores securely and recharges in the premium Surface Pro X Signature Keyboard with Slim Pen, featuring a large glass trackpad and luxurious, Alcantara® material covering. Surface Pro X Signature Keyboard with Slim Pen is compatible with Surface Pro X only.

name: Surface Pro X Keyboard
description: For a comfortable typing experience anywhere, pair Surface Pro X Keyboard with Surface Pro X.* Sleek and compact, it also features a large trackpad for precise navigation. Compatible with Surface Pro X only.

name: Surface Pro Signature Type Cover
description: For a comfortable typing experience anywhere, pair Surface Pro Signature Type Cover with Surface Pro 7.¹ Sleek and compact, it also includes backlit keys and a large trackpad. Compatible with Surface Pro 7, Surface Pro 3, Surface Pro 4, Surface Pro (5th Gen) and Surface Pro 6 devices.

name: Surface Pro Signature Type Cover
description: For a comfortable typing experience anywhere, pair Surface Pro Signature Type Cover with Surface Pro 7.¹ Sleek and compact, it also includes backlit keys and a large trackpad. Compatible with Surface Pro 7, Surface Pro 3, Surface Pro 4, Surface Pro (5th Gen) and Surface Pro 6 devices.

name: Surface Go Signature Type Cover
description: Pair Surface Go Signature Type Cover with Surface Go for a full-keyboard experience anywhere. Available in Black, plus Platinum, Burgundy and Cobalt Blue in Alcantara®.

name: Surface Go Signature Type Cover
description: Pair Surface Go Signature Type Cover with Surface Go for a full-keyboard experience anywhere. Available in Black, plus Platinum, Burgundy and Cobalt Blue in Alcantara®.

name: Surface Pro Type Cover
description: Add a touch of style to everyday tasks with the Surface Pro Type Cover, a perfect blend of elegance, comfort and technology.

name: Surface Pro Type Cover with Fingerprint ID
description: Touch ID fingerprint technology for extra convenience and security. Ultra-slim, full-size traditional laptop keyboard. Optimal key spacing for fast, fluid typing. LED backlighting. Large glass trackpad for precise control and navigation.

name: Surface Pro Pride Type Cover
description: Celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Stonewall uprising with the limited-edition Surface Pro Pride Type Cover. Compatible with Surface Pro 4, 5 and 6 models.

name: Surface Arc Mouse
description: Slim, light and ready to travel, Surface Arc Mouse is designed to conform to your hand and snaps flat to fit easily in your bag. Connects via Bluetooth. Available in a choice of rich colours¹ to complement your style.

name: Surface Arc Mouse

name: Surface Keyboard
description: Meticulously crafted, just like Surface. Sleek and simple design. Optimised feedback and return force. Bluetooth 4.0.

name: Surface Ergonomic Keyboard
description: Designed for productivity and advanced comfort. Natural arc and slope. Palm rest covered in stunning two-tone grey mélange Alcantara. Bluetooth 4.0.

name: Microsoft Designer Bluetooth Desktop
description: Ultra-thin and wireless, the Microsoft Designer Bluetooth Desktop features a full-sized keyboard and an accurate, comfortable mouse. Works with Windows 10, 8.1, 8, RT 8.1 and RT 8. Does not work with Windows 7.
